tool_description: Creates detailed audit logs for all customer profile operations to ensure compliance, traceability, and security monitoring.

operation_type.description: Type of operation: create, read, update, delete, export, consent_change, privacy_update, or merge

customer_id.description: Customer identifier affected by the operation

user_id.description: Identifier of user or system performing the operation

operation_details.description: JSON string describing what was modified or accessed

ip_address.description: IP address from which operation was performed

error_messages: Invalid operation_type: Use one of [create, read, update, delete, export, consent_change, privacy_update, merge].
Missing required fields: operation_type, customer_id, user_id, operation_details, and success_status are required.
Invalid operation_details format: Provide properly formatted JSON string describing the operation.
Audit log storage failed: Unable to write audit record to secure storage.
Invalid IP address format: Provide valid IPv4 or IPv6 address format.
usage: Provide operation details immediately after any customer profile operation to create audit trail. The tool ensures tamper-proof logging for compliance requirements.

audit_id.description: Unique identifier for this audit log entry

log_timestamp.description: When the audit log was created

log_recorded.description: Whether audit log was successfully recorded

compliance_hash.description: Cryptographic hash of log entry for integrity verification
